akn:section.akn:heading: Annual report on force structure changes exhibit for the defense budget

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Not later than 10 days after the date on which the budget of the President for a fiscal year is submitted to Congress pursuant to section 1105 of title 31, the Secretary of Defense shall submit to the congressional defense committees a report on any major weapon systems proposed to be divested, re-prioritized, or retired in such budget.
(b) Each report under subsection (a) shall include the following:
(c) The Secretary of Defense shall ensure that the report required under subsection (a) is deconflicted with the report required under section 222e of this title.
(d) In this section, the term “major weapon system” has the meaning given that term in section 3455(f) of this title.
